subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4761, how did it go?
description_text:
Please don t ask me about the review until i recieve the product. I call the DHL and they told me to talk with you. Do you have any update?


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


On Monday, January 19, 2026, 17:08, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:
